data.text:
Village of Wayland, New York

Not to be confused with the Town of Wayland

Wayland is a village in Steuben County, New York. It is located approximately fifty miles south of the City of Rochester. Wayland is considered part of the Southern Tier region and the Finger Lakes region. The village is within the Town of Wayland. It is the townâs main population area and the location of most town businesses and offices., the village population was estimated at 1,600.

Traffic Tickets in the Village of Wayland

There are two main roads in the village. New York State Route 63 (NYS-63) runs east-west. As it enters the village it is known as East Naples Street and West Naples Street. Route 63 brings motorists between North Cohocton in the east and Dansville in the west. Running north-south is New York State Route 15 (NYS-15). It brings motorists between the I-86 entrance/exit south of the village and the Town of Springwater in the north. In the village it is known as North Lackawanna Street and South Lackawanna Street. Route 63 and Route 15 intersect in the center of the village.

Village traffic stops can be conducted by New York State Police or Village of Wayland Police. All traffic related charges are made answerable to the Village of Wayland Justice Court (Wayland Village Court). The court is in the same location as the Wayland Town Court and shares most of the court personnel. For any traffic ticket in Wayland, you can contact the Benjamin Goldman Law Office.

The Benjamin Goldman Law Office

The Benjamin Goldman Law Office is a New York State traffic ticket law firm. We help many motorists in Steuben County and specifically in Wayland. Our attorneys are diligent and persistent in their quest for the best possible disposition. We do not turn away complicated or difficult cases. Most of our cases are speeding tickets. However, our firm also takes on serious charges like driving with a suspended license and minor charges like disobeying a traffic control device. For any Wayland ticket, you can give us a call. Consultations are free.

Points Reduced or Money Back Guarantee*

Our firm offers a Point Reduction or Money Back Guarantee*. This means we will issue a full refund of your legal fee if we are unable to reduce the points added to your license as a result of the ticket.

*Traffic tickets only. Does not apply to misdemeanors and felonies.
